00023 BodyPathCluster::BodyPathCluster(BodyPath* path) {
00024         this->id = path->id;
00025         first = path->startFrame;
00026         last = path->startFrame + path->GetCount()-1;
00027         this->path.Add(path);
00028 }
00029 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 void BodyPathCluster::AddCluster(BodyPathCluster* that) {
00031         // find first and last common frame
00032         int b = max(this->first, that->first);
00033         int e = min(this->last, that->last);
00034 
00035         // if no common subsequence found, return 
00036         if (b >= e)
00037                 return;
00038 
00039         // update first/last to match longest common subsequence
00040         first = b; last = e;
00041 
00042         // add paths from 'that' cluster
00043         for (int i=0; i < that->path.GetCount(); i++) {
00044                 this->path.Add(that->path[i]);
00045         }
00046 }
00047 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 void BodyPathCluster::Add(BodyPath* that) {
00049         // find first and last common frame
00050         first = min(this->first, that->startFrame);
00051         last  = max(this->last, that->startFrame+that->GetCount()-1);
00052         this->path.Add(that);
00053 }
00054 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 void BodyPathCluster::GetCenter(CArray<Step>& center) {
00056 
00057         for (int i = first; i <= last; i++) {
00058                 CvPoint2D32f p = cvPoint2D32f(0,0);
00059                 double height = 0, width = 0;
00060                 for (int n = 0; n < path.GetCount(); n++) {
00061                         p.x += path[n]->GetAt(i-path[n]->startFrame).p.x;
00062                         p.y += path[n]->GetAt(i-path[n]->startFrame).p.y;
00063                 }
00064                 p.x /= path.GetCount();
00065                 p.y /= path.GetCount();
00066                 center.Add(Step(p, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0));
00067         }
00068 }
00069 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 double BodyPathCluster::Compare(BodyPathCluster* that, int mature_path, int delta, int step) {
00071         // find first and last common frame
00072         int b = max(this->first, that->first);
00073         int e = min(this->last, that->last);
00074 
00075         // if longest common subsequence is too short, return large number
00076         if (e-b <= 2*delta/step)
00077                 return Double::MaxValue;
00078 
00079         // computer centers of each cluster
00080         CArray<Step> center1, center2;
00081         this->GetCenter(center1);
00082         that->GetCenter(center2);
00083 
00084         // compute distance
00085         double distance_all = 0;
00086         int shift_count = 0;
00087         for (int shift=-delta; shift<=delta; shift+=step) {
00088                 double distance = 0;
00089                 double denom_all = 0;
00090                 double denom = exp(-1.0*shift/delta);
00091                 for (int i = b; i < e; i++) {
00092                         if (i-that->first+shift >=0 && i+shift <= that->last) {
00093                                 distance += d(center1[i-this->first].p, center2[i-that->first+shift].p)*denom;
00094                                 denom_all += denom;
00095                         }
00096                 }
00097                 if (denom_all == 0)
00098                         continue;
00099                 distance_all += distance/denom_all;
00100                 shift_count++;
00101         }
00102         return distance_all/shift_count;
00103 }
00104 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105 bool BodyPathCluster::IsInCluster(int id) {
00106         for (int i=0; i < this->path.GetCount(); i++)
00107                 if (this->path[i]->id == id)
00108                         return true;
00109         return false;
00110 
00111 }
